meanings.definition: Suffering from anorexia nervosa, an eating disorder characterized by an abnormally low body weight.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her as anorexic due to her extreme weight loss.
meanings.sent2: She became anorexic after struggling with body image issues.
meanings.sent3: Even the cake looked anorexic next to the giant birthday pie.
meanings.sent4: The garden, anorexic from lack of rain, begged for water.
meanings.sent5: The anorexic tree branches barely held the weight of the snow.

meanings.sent1: The anorexic attended therapy sessions to overcome their eating disorder.
meanings.sent2: She knew she needed help when she realized she had become an anorexic.
meanings.sent3: The anorexic at the party only nibbled on carrot sticks.
meanings.sent4: The anorexic in the mirror reflected a struggle with self-image.
meanings.sent5: The anorexic's family supported them through their recovery journey.

meanings.sent1: Her anorexic behavior raised concerns among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The model's anorexic appearance worried the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: The anorexic cat refused to eat anything but a few bites of fish.
meanings.sent4: The anorexic clouds seemed to starve the land of much-needed rain.
meanings.sent5: His anorexic frame made it clear he needed medical attention.
